mainText:
For raising the standard for" amazing." For showing us all what well thought
out technology can do. For making the inspiring world that was previously
reserved for geeks and nerds accessible to everyone. Without Apple, I
wouldn't have a job as a Final Cut Pro editor. I wouldn't be able to find
just the song I needed when I'm feeling down. And I wouldn't have learned
that true magic is achievable with the right mix
of innovation, perseverance, and leadership.

Rest in peace, Steve.
author: Scott
